SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller

Interface ClientControllerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
ControllerInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientController
public interface ClientControllerInterface extends ControllerInterface
The ClientControllerInterface extends ControllerInterface to provide methods specific to client-side operations in response to an action required by the Server.

Methods defined in this interface are:

  • throwException(Exception) - Handles and shows exceptions thrown by the server.
  • setNickname(String) - Sets the client's nickname.
  • restoreGame(ClientGame, String, Map) - Restores the game state, receiving all the info to fully synchronize and represent the game.
  • setLobbies(Map) - Sets all the available lobbies.
  • updateLobby(Lobby) - Updates a lobby after an event has happened.
  • startGame(ClientGame) - Starts a new game.
  • confirmObjectiveChoice(int) - Confirms the chosen objective card.
  • placeCard(String, GenericPair, int, Side, EnumMap, List, int) - Places a card on the game board.
  • receiveObjectiveChoice(List) - Receives the list of objective cards to choose from.
  • receiveCard(int) - Receives an update related to some new received cards, such as a new card obtained in hand.
  • replaceCard(List) - Replaces cards on the game board, such as visible resources or top of the deck cards.
  • invalid reference 
    #setPlayerActivity(String)
    - Toggles the active state of a player.
  • transition(int, int, int) - Handles the transitions.
  • pauseGame() - Pauses the game.
  • endGame(List, boolean) - Ends the game and provides the final scores.
  • addChatMessage(String, String, boolean) - Adds a chat message to the chat log.

  • Method Details

    • throwException

      void throwException(Exception e)
      Handles exceptions that occur during operations requested by the client by throwing the Exception returned by the Server
      Parameters:
      e - The exception to be handled.

    • keepAlive

      void keepAlive()
      Keeps the session alive to prevent disconnection.

    • setNickname

      void setNickname(String nickname)
      Sets the client's nickname given confirmation by the Server
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname to be set.

    • restoreGame

      void restoreGame(ClientGame gameDTO, String currentState, Map<String,LinkedHashMap<GenericPair<Integer,Integer>,GenericPair<Integer,Side>>> playersField)
      Restores the game state for the client, setting all the parameters to be displayed related to the GameModel and View.
      Parameters:
      gameDTO - The game data transfer object containing all the relevant game's common information.
      currentState - The current state of the game, such as the initial phase, the placing phase or drawing phase.
      playersField - A map representing the players' fields, containing all the IDs of the placed cards up to this moment.

    • setLobbies

      void setLobbies(Map<UUID,Lobby> lobbies)
      Sets all the available lobbies, replacing the old info currently stored on the model.
      Parameters:
      lobbies - A map of available lobbies.

    • updateLobby

      void updateLobby(Lobby lobby)
      Updates the specified lobby after an event has happened, such as joining, leaving or cancelling it.
      Parameters:
      lobby - The lobby to be updated.

    • startGame

      void startGame(ClientGame gameDTO)
      Starts a new game for the client.
      Parameters:
      gameDTO - The game data transfer object containing the game's initial information.

    • confirmObjectiveChoice

      void confirmObjectiveChoice(int cardID)
      Confirms the chosen objective card requested by the client.
      Parameters:
      cardID - The ID of the chosen objective card.

    • placeCard

      void placeCard(String nickname, GenericPair<Integer,Integer> coordinates, int cardID, Side playedSide, EnumMap<Resource,Integer> ownedResources, List<GenericPair<Integer,Integer>> openCorners, int points)
      Places a card on the game board.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player placing the card.
      coordinates - The coordinates where the card is to be placed.
      cardID - The ID of the card being placed.
      playedSide - The side of the card being played.
      ownedResources - The resources owned by the player after playing this card.
      openCorners - The list of open corners on the game board.
      points - The points eventually scored by placing the card.

    • receiveObjectiveChoice

      void receiveObjectiveChoice(List<Integer> cardIDs)
      Receives the list of (two) objective cards to choose from.
      Parameters:
      cardIDs - A list of objective card IDs.

    • receiveCard

      void receiveCard(int cardID)
      Receives an update related to a new received card, such as a new card obtained in hand.
      Parameters:
      cardID - The ID of the received card.

    • replaceCard

      void replaceCard(List<Triplet<Integer,String,Integer>> cardPlacements)
      Replaces cards on the game board, such as visible resources or top of the deck cards.
      Parameters:
      cardPlacements - A list of triplets representing card placements.

    • setPlayerActivity

      void setPlayerActivity(String nickname, boolean isActive)
      Changes the active status of this player to the given activity status.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player whose active state is to be toggled.

    • transition

      void transition(int round, int currentPlayerIndex, int turnsLeftUntilGameEnds)
      Handles the transitions, creating and assigning a new GameState.
      Parameters:
      round - The current round of the game.
      currentPlayerIndex - The index of the current player.
      turnsLeftUntilGameEnds - The number of turns before the game ends and the leaderboard arrives.

    • pauseGame

      void pauseGame()
      Pauses the game, until the game ends or someone reconnects.

    • endGame

      void endGame(List<Triplet<String,Integer,Integer>> pointsStats, boolean gameEndedDueToDisconnections)
      Ends the game and provides the final scores.
      Parameters:
      pointsStats - A list of triplets containing the player nickname, points, and other stats.
      gameEndedDueToDisconnections - Whether the game ended due to disconnections.

    • addChatMessage

      void addChatMessage(String senderNickname, String chatMessage, boolean isPrivate)
      Adds a chat message to the chat log.
      Parameters:
      senderNickname - The nickname of the message sender.
      chatMessage - The content of the chat message.
      isPrivate - Whether the message is private.
